title.rendered: Captain Jelle de Vries joins AqualisBraemar

content.rendered:
We are pleased to advise that Captain Jelle De Vries joined AqualisBraemar earlier this year as Marine Manager in Singapore and to lead the business in Malaysia.

Jelle is well known in the marine and offshore industry in this region where he has worked for over 40 years and brings with him a wealth of knowledge and experience.

Many of us have worked alongside Jelle on a variety of projects in Asia and welcome him as part of the team.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Oil & Gas Asia 2017
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar shared a booth with PRISM Risk and Safety Consultants at this year’s Oil & Gas Asia Exhibition at the Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre from 11 to 13 July 2017.   The OGA is now reportedly the biggest Oil & Gas event in the region and has been running since…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Meet the Team: Juan Vieiros
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We are driven by the idea that the best work is born from professionalism, diligence… and fun. You know AqualisBraemar, but do you know our team?

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar continues to add to the London marine team
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We are delighted to announce that we have continued to strengthen our Marine team with Fena Boyle joining the London team.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Meet the Team: Richard Bailey
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We are driven by the idea that the best work is born from professionalism, diligence… and fun. You know AqualisBraemar, but do you know our team?

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar appoints new head of Adjusting in Middle East and India
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has appointed Dirk Jol to head up the group’s adjusting division in the Middle East and India.

jetpack-related-posts.title: OWC appoints foundations engineer Paul Hatfield to expand competencies
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: OWC, AqualisBraemar’s wholly-owned renewables arm, is delighted to announce the appointment of experienced foundation engineer Paul Hatfield to bolster its engineering team as Principal Foundations Engineer.
